title: Cardano enters beta test phase for new blockchain-based AI chat bot Girolamo
description:
CardanoGPT has announced the beta launch of Girolamo, an AI-powered chatbot, marking a significant step in its commitment to integrating artificial intelligence (AI) with blockchain technology, according to a press release. Named after the influential Italian mathematician Girolamo Cardano, this development signifies a new phase in Cardano’s exploration of artificial intelligence within the blockchain sector. […]

The post Cardano enters beta test phase for new blockchain-based AI chat bot Girolamo appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Putin Takes Aim at Western AI Monopoly, Advocates for National Strategy
description: In a strategic move to safeguard Russia from the perils of Western AI dominance, President Vladimir Putin has unveiled plans for a national strategy for artificial intelligence development. The Russian leader, addressing an AI conference in Moscow, emphasized the necessity of utilizing homegrown solutions to ensure the reliability, transparency, and safety of AI systems. The ...
